A comparison of results for every iteration computed with CCD equations, using naive approach and intermediates. I have added a weight of 0.5 to deal with divergence. This works as a benchmark for the inclusion of Intermediates.
The system consist of 4 shells, and 4 hole states. 
I have used 21 values of g, equally spaced, ranging from -1 to 1
Below are the reference energy and calculated correlation energies for all iterations in following order
Line 1: g, Reference energy, Number of iterations, energies for all iterations by Naive implementation of CCD
Line 2: g, Reference energy, Number of iterations, energies for all iterations by Intermediate implementation of CCD
-1 3 20 -0.466667 -0.153407 -0.392821 -0.210186 -0.354073 -0.24245 -0.330408 -0.261831 -0.315787 -0.273617 -0.306758 -0.280821 -0.301188 -0.285236 -0.297756 -0.287945 -0.295642 -0.289609 -0.294342 -0.290631
